scripts.start:file-backed: mkdir -p hosted-build-artifacts && S3_WRITE='' S3_READ='' node server.js
scripts.start:s3-read: mkdir -p hosted-build-artifacts && S3_WRITE='' S3_READ='true' node server.js
scripts.start:s3-read-write: mkdir -p hosted-build-artifacts && S3_WRITE='true' S3_READ='true' node server.js
